### Dr. Rutvij Khedkar, MD

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a senior resident in oncopathology at TMH, Mumbai. Previously I have worked at KEM hospital (Mumbai), HBCHRC (Vizag) and Command Hospital (Eastern Command, Kolkata) as a pathologist.

I have also worked as an intern at the Sir Jamshetjee Jeejeebhoy group of hospitals (rotatory intern).

I have studied at General Education Academy (Secondary School), SIES Junior College (Higher Secondary School) and Grant Medical College (Undergraduation).
